subject: Football
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: Players credit Tom Coughlin for the team’s turnaround after an 0-2 start. “I think he’s come in with more energy, more enthusiasm,” one Giant said.
snippet: Players credit Tom Coughlin for the team’s turnaround after an 0-2 start. “I think he’s come in with more energy, more enthusiasm,” one Giant said.
